roleset.name: consisting of multiple layers
roleset.note: MULTILAYERED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, somewhat related to 'layer-v.01'. (from multilayered.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: The palate is multi-layered with very sweet fruit flavors and powerful yet supple tannins
example.arg: with very sweet fruit flavors and powerful yet supple tannins
